articles.title: American 'Bibisitters' try to keep the Israel-Hamas truce on track - NPR
articles.description: Several top U.S. officials are in Israel to shore up the Gaza ceasefire and attempt to bring about a permanent end to the war. They acknowledge the next phase poses serious challenges.
articles.content:
TEL AVIV, Israel Vice President Vance said Wednesday the Israel-Hamas ceasefire is holding, but he acknowledged the challenges involved in trying to end the war entirely.
"We have a very tough task … [+3803 chars]
